title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create reusable components with props:

1. Create a `BlogPost` function that takes props:
   - title
   - author
   - content
   - Returns formatted HTML string

2. Create an `AuthorBio` function that takes:
   - name
   - bio
   - Returns formatted HTML string

3. Create a `Blog` function that:
   - Uses BlogPost twice with different data
   - Uses AuthorBio once
   - Returns complete blog page

Test by calling Blog() and logging result.
